title: Basic Usage
content: Use options to specify options. You can also use props to set functions such as multiple selection and dynamic loading. For details, see the API table below.
findIntroStr: Like the cascading selector, the cascading panel has multiple functions, such as single selection, multiple selection, and dynamic loading.

title: Selected node changes
content: The event is triggered after a node is clicked through change. The callback parameter is the value of the selected node. You can clear the selected node through clearCheckedNodes. Obtain the selected node through getCheckedNodes.
findIntroStr: Like the cascading selector, the cascading panel has multiple functions, such as single selection, multiple selection, and dynamic loading.

title: The expanded node changes.
content: This event is triggered when you click expand-change to expand a node. The callback parameter is an array consisting of parent option values
findIntroStr: Like the cascading selector, the cascading panel has multiple functions, such as single selection, multiple selection, and dynamic loading.

title: Custom Node Content
content: You can use scoped slot to customize the node content of the options of the cascading panel. scoped slot transfers two fields: node and data, indicating the node object and data of the current node, respectively.
findIntroStr: Like the cascading selector, the cascading panel has multiple functions, such as single selection, multiple selection, and dynamic loading.

title: Props Options
content:
Props

specifies child options with children. The default value is children. Indicates whether to return an array consisting of the values of the menus where the node is located through emitPath. Use label to specify the label value of the display option. The default value is label. Use value to specify the value of the value option. The default value is value
findIntroStr: Like the cascading selector, the cascading panel has multiple functions, such as single selection, multiple selection, and dynamic loading.
